code: import React,{useState}from'react';import aiHelpService from'../../services/aiHelpService';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HelpDesk=()=>{const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const[response,setResponse]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);const res=await aiHelpService.askHelp(query);setResponse(res);setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Help Desk"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"w-full p-2 border rounded mb-2",rows:4,placeholder:"Describe your issue or question...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"px-4 py-2 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Submitting...':'Submit'})]}),response&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Response:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:response})]})]});};export default HelpDesk;
